summary: This simple mod adds a subtle head bobbing effect when you walk.
descriptionHtml:
Also available on Steam: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=187504415]click here[/url] !

[quote]This mod may not be suitable to those prone to fits, nausea, epilepsy or seizures, and can also strain the eyes if used for longer, sustained (continuous) period of time.
[/quote]

This simple mod adds a subtle head bobbing effect when you walk ; it\'s configurable with
SkyUI\'s MCM.
The mod itself does not require SKSE, only the MCM does.

[youtube]Fig2m3u-ITI[/youtube]
author: Sagittarius22
